Class EmployeeDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • clasesDAO.ContenedorDAO
      • clasesDAO.EmployeeDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceDAO<Employees>, InterfaceEmployeeDAO

    public class EmployeeDAO
extends ContenedorDAO
implements InterfaceEmployeeDAO
    Clase EmployeeDAO para gestionar los métodos de acceso a la tabla Employee de la base de datos.
    Author:
    Diego Santamaría
    See Also:
    InterfaceEmployeeDAO, ContenedorDAO
